data.title: University of Mississippi
data.meta_description: Ryan Starr (28) INF - 2024 (SOPHOMORE): Started all 58 games at shortstop for the Rebels … Helped lead Ole Miss to its eighth straight NCAA Tournament appear...
data.text:
2024 (SOPHOMORE): Started all 58 games at shortstop for the Rebels … Helped lead Ole Miss to its eighth straight NCAA Tournament appearance … Recorded a .162 batting average with 18 hits … Scored 20 runs and drove in three more … Assisted in turning 13 double plays … Registered a .937 fielding percentage … Doubled and scored a run in her Rebel debut vs. BYU (2/8) … Delivered the tying RBI and tallied a walk-off single in Ole Miss’ first win of the season (2/9) … Walked twice at Hawaii (2/10) … Scored two runs in the win over ETSU (2/17) … Added two runs in the rubber match against No. 2 LSU (3/18), helping the Rebels secure their highest ranked series win in program history … Tripled and scored a run in the win over Western Kentucky (4/13) … Singled and scored a run against No. 25 Kentucky (5/7) in the opening game of the SEC Tournament.

SYRACUSE: Started 42 games at shortstop and finished the season with 23 hits while hitting .237 ... Flashed her speed on the basepaths, swiping 14 bags and scoring 19 runs ... Only committed eight errors in 122 chances as a freshman ... Logged a hit in her collegiate debut against IUPUI (2/10) … Recorded three runs, a double, and a walk in a 10-4 win over North Floirda (2/10) … Produced her first extra-base hit with a double against PURDUE (2/17) … Reached home safely twice with a hit against IOWA (2/19) … Hit a single against NC State (4/7) … Hit two singles in the doubleheader against UALBANY (4/12) … Went on a seven game hitting streak, recording 11 hits during the streak. She was named to the 2022-23 ACC Academic Honor Roll.

HIGH SCHOOL: Attended Massapequa High School in New York...Led her team to Nassau County Championships in 2021 and 2022...Batted .554 and recorded 23 RBIs her senior season...Was team captain her senior season.
